article.title: L-3 Awarded Data Link C2 Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Systems, Salt Lake City, Utah, is being awarded a $10,005,050 a firm-fixed-price contract to procure beyond-line-of-sight command and control for long lead common data link items parts and labor.Â Air Force Materiel Command, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
